Where did such a large army come from!?\""},{"lineNumber":24945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「主力はカーソンであろう！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The main force should be at Carson, right!?\""},{"lineNumber":24946,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それ故、ヨシフ様にまでご足労願ったのだぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's why we even asked Lord Yosif to come all this way!\""},{"lineNumber":24947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだヨ！　現に今、リーザス軍の主力どもと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right! Right now, they're actually fighting the main forces of the Lias Army,"},{"lineNumber":24948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　交戦している最中じゃないかネ！","translatedEnglishLine":"aren't they!?\""},{"lineNumber":24949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴らの女王まで姿を見せているのだヨ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even their queen has made an appearance!\""},{"lineNumber":24950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっ、しかし、実際に敵が……人間どもが！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-But, the enemy... the humans are actually here!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言っても、働いてもらうのはここから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That said, the real work starts from here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忙しくなるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's going to get busy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数万に及ぶ規模の部隊は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The force, numbering in the tens of thousands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地に駐屯していた魔軍をあっさりと蹴散らし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: easily scattered the demon army stationed in this land,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在は部隊の再編を行っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is currently reorganizing the troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウレーン。戦闘に関しては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haureen. As for the combat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君の部隊が白の軍の主力だからね。頼んだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your unit is the main force of the White Army. I'm counting on you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は。お任せください。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Leave it to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、将軍の直属は、どちらに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But who is directly under the general...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「情報収集。どうしても必要でね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Information gathering. It's absolutely necessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーンは、それ以上追及しなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haureen did not press further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の上官はこういう時、普通の者とは違う視点で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She knew that her superior officer looked at situations like this from a perspective different from ordinary people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 事態を見ている事を、彼女は知っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She understood this about him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはいいが……何故待つ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's fine... but why wait?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大急ぎなのだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it supposed to be urgent?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、それは大きな意味はないですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that doesn't have much significance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 単に戦術上の問題で――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's simply a tactical matter—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山を吹き下ろす風に乗って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carried by the wind blowing down from the mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くから喚声のようなものが聞こえてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a shouting sound could be heard from afar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ、は……赤の軍…………？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That, is that... the Red Army...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずい、出遅れたぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, we're late!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、いい頃合いです。全軍、出撃準備」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is the perfect timing. All units, prepare to sortie."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は…………出撃準備！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... prepare to sortie!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい頃合いだと？　まさか、お前……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Perfect timing? Surely you don't..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤の軍は目立ちますからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Red Army stands out, you see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうに意識を取られた、その後ろを突きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll strike behind them while their attention is on that side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう……なんだか、ズルい気もするが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... somehow that feels a bit sneaky...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方を先に危険に突っ込ませるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're sending the allies into danger first."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤の軍の初撃は、充分不意打ちになりますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Red Army's first strike will be a sufficient surprise attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらはその混乱を長引かせようという意図です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our intention is to prolong that confusion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤の軍と、同等の仕事を要求されているんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're being asked to do the same job as the Red Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これくらいはいいでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This much is reasonable, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………失敗は、できないから、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Because we cannot afford to fail."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以上の問答はなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no further discussion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクス達の部隊は出撃準備を整えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Ex's unit prepared to sortie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう事なら、一番槍はもらうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In that case, I'll take the first spear."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご存分に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By all means."
"—Charge!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、ここが作戦の勘所だ。白の軍、いこうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, this is the crucial point of the operation. White Army, let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雪崩を打って、リーザス軍は混乱を生み始めた魔軍へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like an avalanche, the Lias Army charged into the demon forces already beginning to fall into chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They charged forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――魔軍は、混乱の渦に叩き込まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The demon army was thrown into a whirlpool of chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼前で、ほぼ全軍同士の決戦を行っていたはずが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were supposed to be engaged in a nearly full-scale battle right before their eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然現れた別働隊に後背を突かれ、一方的に包囲されていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but were suddenly attacked from behind by an unexpected detachment and gradually surrounded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その降って湧いた人間達の正体も分からず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to identify these suddenly appeared humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍はただただ分断されていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army was simply broken apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スケールからマウネスを経由した部隊が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Units passing through Scale to Maunes are attempting to divide our army!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が軍を分断しようとしています！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are trying to split our forces!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に、Ｌ．Ｃ．Ｍ連山からも……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, from the L.C.M mountain range as well...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、このままでは我が軍は包囲され……いえ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate our army will be encircled... no,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に包囲されつつあります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we are already in the process of being encircled!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な――なんですと！？　どこからそんな大軍が！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What!? Where did such a large army come from!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「主力はカーソンであろう！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The main force should be at Carson, right!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ故、ヨシフ様にまでご足労願ったのだぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why we even asked Lord Yosif to come all this way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだヨ！　現に今、リーザス軍の主力どもと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right! Right now, they're actually fighting the main forces of the Lias Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 交戦している最中じゃないかネ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: aren't they!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らの女王まで姿を見せているのだヨ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even their queen has made an appearance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっ、しかし、実際に敵が……人間どもが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-But, the enemy... the humans are actually here!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

White Army, let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":24932,"originalJapaneseLine":"雪崩を打って、リーザス軍は混乱を生み始めた魔軍へ","translatedEnglishLine":"Like an avalanche, the Lias Army charged into the demon forces already beginning to fall into chaos."},{"lineNumber":24933,"originalJapaneseLine":"突撃していった。","translatedEnglishLine":"They charged forward."},{"lineNumber":24934,"originalJapaneseLine":"――魔軍は、混乱の渦に叩き込まれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"—The demon army was thrown into a whirlpool of chaos."},{"lineNumber":24935,"originalJapaneseLine":"眼前で、ほぼ全軍同士の決戦を行っていたはずが、","translatedEnglishLine":"They were supposed to be engaged in a nearly full-scale battle right before their eyes,"},{"lineNumber":24936,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然現れた別働隊に後背を突かれ、一方的に包囲されていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"but were suddenly attacked from behind by an unexpected detachment and gradually surrounded."},{"lineNumber":24937,"originalJapaneseLine":"その降って湧いた人間達の正体も分からず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Unable to identify these suddenly appeared humans,"},{"lineNumber":24938,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍はただただ分断されていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon army was simply broken apart."},{"lineNumber":24939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「スケールからマウネスを経由した部隊が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Units passing through Scale to Maunes are attempting to divide our army!"},{"lineNumber":24940,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我が軍を分断しようとしています！","translatedEnglishLine":"They are trying to split our forces!"},{"lineNumber":24941,"originalJapaneseLine":"　更に、Ｌ．Ｃ．Ｍ連山からも……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Furthermore, from the L.C.M mountain range as well...!\""},{"lineNumber":24942,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、このままでは我が軍は包囲され……いえ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At this rate our army will be encircled... no,"},{"lineNumber":24943,"originalJapaneseLine":"　既に包囲されつつあります！」","translatedEnglishLine":"we are already in the process of being encircled!\""},{"lineNumber":24944,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な――なんですと！？　どこからそんな大軍が！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What!? Where did such a large army come from!?\""},{"lineNumber":24945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「主力はカーソンであろう！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The main force should be at Carson, right!?\""},{"lineNumber":24946,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それ故、ヨシフ様にまでご足労願ったのだぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's why we even asked Lord Yosif to come all this way!\""},{"lineNumber":24947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだヨ！　現に今、リーザス軍の主力どもと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right! Right now, they're actually fighting the main forces of the Lias Army,"},{"lineNumber":24948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　交戦している最中じゃないかネ！","translatedEnglishLine":"aren't they!?\""},{"lineNumber":24949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴らの女王まで姿を見せているのだヨ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even their queen has made an appearance!\""},{"lineNumber":24950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっ、しかし、実際に敵が……人間どもが！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-But, the enemy... the humans are actually here!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言っても、働いてもらうのはここから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That said, the real work starts from here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忙しくなるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's going to get busy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数万に及ぶ規模の部隊は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The force, numbering in the tens of thousands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地に駐屯していた魔軍をあっさりと蹴散らし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: easily scattered the demon army stationed in this land,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在は部隊の再編を行っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is currently reorganizing the troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウレーン。戦闘に関しては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haureen. As for the combat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君の部隊が白の軍の主力だからね。頼んだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your unit is the main force of the White Army. I'm counting on you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は。お任せください。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Leave it to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、将軍の直属は、どちらに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But who is directly under the general...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「情報収集。どうしても必要でね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Information gathering. It's absolutely necessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーンは、それ以上追及しなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haureen did not press further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の上官はこういう時、普通の者とは違う視点で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She knew that her superior officer looked at situations like this from a perspective different from ordinary people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 事態を見ている事を、彼女は知っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She understood this about him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはいいが……何故待つ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's fine... but why wait?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大急ぎなのだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it supposed to be urgent?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、それは大きな意味はないですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that doesn't have much significance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 単に戦術上の問題で――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's simply a tactical matter—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山を吹き下ろす風に乗って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carried by the wind blowing down from the mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くから喚声のようなものが聞こえてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a shouting sound could be heard from afar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ、は……赤の軍…………？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That, is that... the Red Army...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずい、出遅れたぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, we're late!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、いい頃合いです。全軍、出撃準備」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is the perfect timing. All units, prepare to sortie."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は…………出撃準備！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... prepare to sortie!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい頃合いだと？　まさか、お前……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Perfect timing? Surely you don't..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤の軍は目立ちますからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Red Army stands out, you see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうに意識を取られた、その後ろを突きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll strike behind them while their attention is on that side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう……なんだか、ズルい気もするが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... somehow that feels a bit sneaky...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方を先に危険に突っ込ませるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're sending the allies into danger first."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤の軍の初撃は、充分不意打ちになりますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Red Army's first strike will be a sufficient surprise attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらはその混乱を長引かせようという意図です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our intention is to prolong that confusion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤の軍と、同等の仕事を要求されているんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're being asked to do the same job as the Red Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これくらいはいいでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This much is reasonable, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………失敗は、できないから、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Because we cannot afford to fail."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以上の問答はなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no further discussion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクス達の部隊は出撃準備を整えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Ex's unit prepared to sortie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう事なら、一番槍はもらうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In that case, I'll take the first spear."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご存分に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By all means."
"—Charge!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、ここが作戦の勘所だ。白の軍、いこうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, this is the crucial point of the operation. White Army, let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雪崩を打って、リーザス軍は混乱を生み始めた魔軍へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like an avalanche, the Lias Army charged into the demon forces already beginning to fall into chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They charged forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――魔軍は、混乱の渦に叩き込まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The demon army was thrown into a whirlpool of chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼前で、ほぼ全軍同士の決戦を行っていたはずが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were supposed to be engaged in a nearly full-scale battle right before their eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然現れた別働隊に後背を突かれ、一方的に包囲されていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but were suddenly attacked from behind by an unexpected detachment and gradually surrounded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その降って湧いた人間達の正体も分からず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to identify these suddenly appeared humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍はただただ分断されていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army was simply broken apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スケールからマウネスを経由した部隊が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Units passing through Scale to Maunes are attempting to divide our army!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が軍を分断しようとしています！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are trying to split our forces!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に、Ｌ．Ｃ．Ｍ連山からも……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, from the L.C.M mountain range as well...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、このままでは我が軍は包囲され……いえ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate our army will be encircled... no,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に包囲されつつあります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we are already in the process of being encircled!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な――なんですと！？　どこからそんな大軍が！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What!? Where did such a large army come from!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「主力はカーソンであろう！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The main force should be at Carson, right!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ故、ヨシフ様にまでご足労願ったのだぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why we even asked Lord Yosif to come all this way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだヨ！　現に今、リーザス軍の主力どもと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right! Right now, they're actually fighting the main forces of the Lias Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 交戦している最中じゃないかネ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: aren't they!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らの女王まで姿を見せているのだヨ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even their queen has made an appearance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっ、しかし、実際に敵が……人間どもが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-But, the enemy... the humans are actually here!
